products.title: Samsung Customisable Bezel Frame for 32" The Frame TVs (White)
products.body_html:
Overview

The Frameâ€™s interchangeable frame is the secret to interior harmony. It magnetically attaches to the standard charcoal metal frame, allowing The Frame to beautifully complement any space.

Key Features

Quick and easy installation - Get a new look, fast
It's effortless to refresh The Frame's appearance, with customisable frames that adhere with magnets. Snap on the frame of your choice to update the view.

Simple and harmonious design
Each customisable frame fits The Frame seamlessly, accentuating its sleek, clean lines and crisp angles. Just pick the finish that best suits your style.

* Not compatible with QA32LS03CBWXXY

products.title: XGIMI Horizon Pro Home Theatre Projector
products.body_html:
True 4K Technology
Image quality with stunning clarity and crisply defined details. NOT Double HD or 2K. better image resolution and quality

2200 ANSI Lumens
Brightness that fit different light conditions scenarios and times of day. Expand the usage of projection to more than movies.

AK & AF Technology
Incredible power under the hood. Superb processing speed to adjust to different projection set-ups. Flexible to fit any room without interrupting the existing furniture and design of the user's home.

One well designed All in 1 Box
Eliminates fear. Understated simplicity. Transportable. Fits comfortably on any space without the need for complicated set-ups. Beautiful Design that matches user home decoration expectations.

Android TV
Radical ease of learning and ease of use. No strange settings. Sync across devices: Mobile, Desk, Streaming services. Works the way you do.

Dual 8W 45mm diameter full-range speaker
Endlessly vibrant, accurate, beautiful sound, culminating in a superb audio-visual experience. Used alone as a set of high-quality Bluetooth speakers.

Key Features

4K UHD DLP Home Theatre Projector

2200 ANSI Lumens and up to 30,000 hours of lamp life

Smart tech powered by Android TV 10.0

Sound by Harman Kardon

Auto Keystone Screen Adaption

WARNING: This product contains a button/coin battery and is hazardous. Keep batteries away from children. Batteries can cause severe or fatal injuries in 2 hours or less if swallowed or placed inside any part of the body. Medical attention should be sought immediately if it is suspected the battery has been swallowed or placed inside any part of the body.
